_WIN_CERTIFICATE_EFI_PKCS1_15 Struct Reference


Data Fields

WIN_CERTIFICATE Hdr
EFI_GUID HashAlgorithm

Detailed Description

Certificate which encapsulates the RSASSA_PKCS1-v1_5 digital signature.

The WIN_CERTIFICATE_UEFI_PKCS1_15 structure is derived from WIN_CERTIFICATE and encapsulate the information needed to implement the RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 digital signature algorithm as specified in RFC2437.

Field Documentation

EFI_GUID _WIN_CERTIFICATE_EFI_PKCS1_15::HashAlgorithm

This is the hashing algorithm which was performed on the UEFI executable when creating the digital signature.

WIN_CERTIFICATE _WIN_CERTIFICATE_EFI_PKCS1_15::Hdr

This is the standard WIN_CERTIFICATE header, where wCertificateType is set to WIN_CERT_TYPE_UEFI_PKCS1_15.
